title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions: Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. This versatile cleaner combines vacuuming and washing in one, saving you time and effort. With its 36V lithium-ion battery, it provides up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning power, allowing you to move freely around your home. The improved edge cleaning feature easily picks up pet hair along baseboards and in corners. The cleaner is safe and effective on various surfaces such as tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, and more. It even refreshes area rugs. The two-tank technology keeps clean and dirty water separate, ensuring a hygienic cleaning process. After use, the self-cleaning cycle cleans the brush roll and inside of the machine, minimizing clean-up. The CrossWave Cordless Max also connects to the BISSELL Connect app, providing helpful alerts, maintenance tracking, and easy reordering of formulas and accessories. Plus, every purchase supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. Upgrade your cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop.

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. With its 36V lithium-ion battery, you get up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning power, allowing you to vacuum and wash your floors at the same time, without being tied to an outlet. This multi-surface cleaner is safe and effective for use on a variety of floors, including tile, sealed wood, laminate, linoleum, and more. It even refreshes area rugs. The improved edge cleaning feature easily picks up pet hair along baseboards and in corners. With the BISSELL Connect app, you can receive helpful alerts, track maintenance, and reorder accessories and formulas with ease. The self-cleaning cycle ensures your machine stays in top performance, and the two-tank technology keeps clean and dirty water separate. Plus, with every purchase, you're supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation and their mission to save homeless pets. Say goodbye to pet messes and hello to a cleaner home with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max.

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. With its cordless freedom and multi-surface cleaning capabilities, this cleaner allows you to vacuum and wash your floors at the same time, saving you time and effort. The 36V lithium-ion battery provides up to 30 minutes of cleaning power, allowing you to move freely around your home. It effectively cleans sealed hard floors, area rugs, and even picks up pet hair along baseboards and in corners. The two-tank technology keeps clean and dirty water separate, ensuring a hygienic clean. After cleaning, the self-cleaning cycle takes care of the brush roll and machine, making cleanup a breeze. Plus, with the BISSELL Connect app, you can receive helpful alerts, maintenance tracking, and easily reorder formulas and accessories. By purchasing this product, you also support the BISSELL Pet Foundation's mission to save homeless pets. Upgrade your cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max.

Introducing the BISSELL® CrossWave® Cordless Max, the ultimate all-in-one wet-dry vacuum cleaner and mop for hard floors and area rugs. With its powerful 36V lithium-ion battery, you'll enjoy up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning freedom, allowing you to move throughout your home without the hassle of cords. 

This innovative multi-surface cleaner not only vacuums and washes at the same time, but it also features improved edge cleaning, making it easier than ever to pick up pet hair and debris along baseboards and in corners. 

With WiFi connected capabilities, the BISSELL Connect app provides helpful alerts, maintenance tracking, and usage tips, as well as easy formula and accessory reordering through Amazon Dash Replenishment. 

The CrossWave® Cordless Max is designed for multi-surface cleaning, making it safe and effective on a variety of flooring types including tile, sealed wood, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, and pressed wood. It even refreshes area rugs, giving your home a thorough, deep clean. 

Thanks to its two-tank technology, clean and dirty water are kept separate, ensuring that only clean water and formula are applied to your floors. And when you're done cleaning, the self-cleaning cycle takes care of the brush roll and inside of the machine, minimizing clean-up time. 

With every purchase of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, you're not only investing in a superior cleaning device, but you're also supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation and their mission to help save homeless pets. 

Experience the convenience and power of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, and say goodbye to the hassle of traditional cleaning methods.

It also offers WiFi connected capabilities, allowing you to use the BISSELL Connect app to receive helpful alerts, track maintenance, and get usage tips. Plus, with Amazon Dash Replenishment, you can easily reorder formula and accessories when you need them.

This multi-surface cleaner is safe and effective for use on a variety of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, and pressed wood floors. It can even refresh area rugs. The two-tank technology keeps clean and dirty water separate, ensuring that only clean water and formula are applied to your floors. And when you're done cleaning, the self-cleaning cycle takes care of cleaning the brush roll and inside of the machine, minimizing the clean-up required.

In addition to its impressive features, the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max also supports a great cause. BISSELL proudly supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. So when you purchase this product, you're not only getting a top-notch cleaner, but you're also helping to make a difference in the lives of pets in need. Don't miss out on this all-in-one cleaning solution that combines power, convenience, and a great cause.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A

Description: EVERY PURCHASE SAVES PETS. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.Brush System : Rotating. Cleaning Path Width : 10.5". Swivel Head : Yes..Carry Handle : Yes. Clean Tank Capacity : Water Tank - 28 oz | Dirt Tank - 18.6 oz

VACUUM & WASH AT THE SAME TIME. Combine floor cleaning chores with cordless freedom.

36V LITHIUM-ION BATTERY. Provides up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning power.

IMPROVED EDGE CLEANING. Easily pick up pet hair that gathers along baseboards and in corners of your home.

WIFI CONNECTED CAPABILITIES. Works with the BISSELL Connect app to provide helpful alerts, maintenance tracking and usage tips, plus formula and accessory reordering made easy with Amazon Dash Replenishment.

SELF-CLEANING CYCLE. Maintain your machine's cleaning performance.

MULTI-SURFACE CLEANING. Safe and effective for use on tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and more. It even refreshes area rugs

BISSELL® CrossWave® Cordless Max multi-surface cleaner combines tasks, vacuuming and washing at the same time, so you save time. The 36V lithium-ion battery provides up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning power*, so you can move throughout your home without being tied to an outlet. Its multi-surface cleaning capabilities let you switch from cleaning sealed hard floors to refreshing area rugs in an instant. CrossWave® Cordless Max multi-surface cleaner also features improved edge cleaning** to clean messes like pet hair along baseboards and in corners. Two-Tank Technology keeps clean and dirty water separate, so unlike mopping, only clean water and formula go on your floor. When you’re finished cleaning, the self-cleaning cycle cleans the brush roll and inside of the machine, so there’s less clean-up after cleaning. It comes with 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls. It also helps save pets! BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear. * May vary based on mode and usage.** Compared to CrossWave and CrossWave Pet Pro multi-surface cleaners.
